combat1.name: Outlander Arts: Vigilant Watch
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

passive1.name: Battlelines Redrawn
passive1.descriptionRaw: When the Manekin leaves the field, if a Restricted Area that they summoned is still active, it will explode, dealing AoE DMG of the Manekin's Elemental Type equal to 200% of the Manekin's ATK.
passive1.description: When the Manekin leaves the field, if a Restricted Area that they summoned is still active, it will explode, dealing AoE DMG of the Manekin's Elemental Type equal to 200% of the Manekin's ATK.

passive2.name: Combat Readiness
passive2.descriptionRaw: When the Manekin is not on the field and their Elemental Energy is below 30%, they will recover 2 Elemental Energy per second.
passive2.description: When the Manekin is not on the field and their Elemental Energy is below 30%, they will recover 2 Elemental Energy per second.

passive3.name: Agile Stance
passive3.descriptionRaw: When the Manekin unleashes an Elemental Skill or Burst, it will change to one of its existing Cosmetic Plans at random.
passive3.description: When the Manekin unleashes an Elemental Skill or Burst, it will change to one of its existing Cosmetic Plans at random.
